attributes.action: include the house of commons in the smoking ban
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: did you know the only place NOT to be included in the smoking ban? The cafes and restaurants in the house of commons, the governments usual do as i say not as i do procedure again! i do not smoke but i think it is a disgrace no one can smoke in public or their work places but the m.p's and such can, out of order where is the justice?

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "include the house of commons in the smoking ban."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15711.asp

Prime Minister's Office
